name: question arcs
description: The first four games of Umineko no Naku Koro ni, which are meant to introduce the characters and the setting of the story. The question arcs are meant to set up the mystery of the story and introduce the main characters and their relationships.

name: answer arcs
description: The last four games of Umineko no Naku Koro ni, which are meant to resolve the mystery of the story. The answer arcs are meant to provide the solution to the mystery and explain the events of the story.
